jhelp.util.xml
Class DynamicWriteXML

java.lang.Object
  jhelp.util.xml.DynamicWriteXML

public class DynamicWriteXML
extends java.lang.Object

Write dynamically an XML to a sream.
No need to create a XML structure for writing it.

Author:
JHelp

DynamicWriteXML

public DynamicWriteXML(java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                       boolean compact,
                       boolean textSameLine)
                throws java.io.IOException
Create a new instance of DynamicWriteXML

Parameters:
outputStream - Stream where write
compact - Indicates if use compact mode
textSameLine - Indicates if text at same line as its markup. Text will be forced in same line if compact mode is true
Throws:
java.io.IOException - On writing header issue

DynamicWriteXML

public DynamicWriteXML(java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                       boolean compact,
                       boolean textSameLine,
                       boolean closeWriterAtEnd)
                throws java.io.IOException
Create a new instance of DynamicWriteXML

Parameters:
outputStream - Stream where write
compact - Indicates if use compact mode
textSameLine - Indicates if text at same line as its markup. Text will be forced in same line if compact mode is true
closeWriterAtEnd - Indicates if have to close the stream when finish
Throws:
java.io.IOException - On writing header issue

closeMarkup

public boolean closeMarkup()
                    throws java.io.IOException
Close current markup

Returns:
true if there are more markup to close. false if this is the last markup close and the the XML writing is finish
Throws:
java.io.IOException - On writing issue
